<!-- DESCRIPTION/ -->
Checks if we are in Gitpod.
<!-- /DESCRIPTION -->

<!-- INSTALL/ -->
## Install

```bash
# npm
$ npm install is-gitpod

# Yarn
$ yarn add is-gitpod
```
<!-- /INSTALL -->

## CLI Usage
The cli script `is-gitpod` either does nothing or fails with exit code 1.

```bash
$ is-gitpod
```

## API Usage

```js
import isGitpod from 'is-gitpod'

const result = await isGitpod()
// true or false
```
